title: Say Her Name
sub_head: Ella French was one of Chicago’s finest.
body:
As Chicago continues to suffer the violence that has become a predictable result of so-called progressive governance, the city is mourning a dedicated public servant. Megan Crepeau, Stephanie Casanova and Paige Fry report in the Chicago Tribune:
One can only imagine how challenging Officer French’s job was in the months before she was killed. The Tribune relates one particularly challenging event:
Chicago residents can be forgiven if they aren’t thanking city politicians for cutting the police budget last year. NBC’s Chicago station has more on Officer French:
***
Biden the Bully
